warscrolls.name: Askurgan Trueblades
warscrolls.fluff: Rather than deny their thirst, the Askurgan Trueblades harness it by feasting upon the blood of beasts and monsters, using the inherent power of these potent fluids to enhance their already devastating combat skills. Few can stand in the face of an Askurgan Trueblade’s efficient strikes, which come so swiftly and precisely that the foe is often reduced to a ruined corpse before they can even draw a breath.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/8), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Gut-wrenching Howl
abilities.lore: The howl of a Curseblood resounds with the force of long-repressed bloodlust finally finding release, staggering even the bravest souls.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit’s **Curseblood** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Creed of the Askurga Renkai
abilities.lore: Faithful to the teachings of ancient masters long slain, Trueblades test themselves against the most powerful adversaries, feasting solely on monstrous blood to bolster their strength and speed.
abilities.effect:
Subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks made by enemy **MONSTERS** that target this unit.

Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by this unit that target enemy **MONSTERS**.

warscrolls.name: Barrow Guard
warscrolls.fluff: Surrounding a Wight King is a coterie of favoured praetorians, champions and housecarls: the Barrow Guard. These are the elite footsoldiers of the Deathrattle legions, imbued with memories of loyalties pledged and oaths of eternal service. Some favour the traditional sword and shield of a monarch’s bodyguard, while others swing huge two-handed blades to carve foes in twain.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Guardians of the King
abilities.lore: The Barrow Guard stand alongside the liege lord to whom they are bound.
abilities.effect: While any friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS INFANTRY HEROES** are within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Barrow Knights
warscrolls.fluff: The finest warriors of a Deathrattle kingdom are granted the rank of Barrow Knight and a prestigious place at the side of their undead monarch. These skeletal cavaliers ride forth to conquer in the name of their liege, and rare are the warriors who can withstand their charge. Even if knocked from the saddle or shattered by cannonfire, these elite riders shall eventually rise again, for the oaths they have sworn will last until the end of time itself.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Knights of the King
abilities.lore: Buried alongside their liege in ancient times, these deathly knights are still bound by arcane ward and ancient oath to ride into battle at their side.
abilities.effect: While any friendly **DEATHRATTLE CAVALRY HEROES** are within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Cursed To Rise Once More
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Necrotic flames wreathe the shattered remains of an undead knight, compelling them to rejoin the battle.
abilities.effect: You can return 1 slain model to this unit.

warscrolls.name: Belladamma Volga, First of the Vyrkos
warscrolls.fluff: When a bloody moon rises in the sky, Belladamma Volga rides at the head of a Dire Wolf pack to bring death and suffering to mortals. The matriarch of the Vyrkos dynasty has fought alongside many of her brood to overwhelm Sigmarite outposts, though she lingers only for the victory feast. Volga’s secrets are hers to keep, and woe betide any who meddle in her business.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (2), Cavalry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: First of the Vyrkos
abilities.lore: Belladamma is the matriarch of the Vyrkos bloodline, and she commands their conquests with calculating efficiency.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of friendly **Radukar the Wolf**, **Radukar the Beast**, **Ivya Volga**, **Lady Annika** and **Kritza** units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.

abilities.name: Wolfguard
abilities.lore: Belladamma’s lupine allies will unthinkingly sacrifice themselves to protect their savage mistress.
abilities.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly **Dire Wolves** unit:

• This unit has **WARD (4+)**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly **Dire Wolves** unit within this unit’s combat range after the damage sequence for this unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Under a Killing Moon
abilities.lore: Beneath the light of a blood moon, Volga’s wolves attack with mad-eyed ferocity.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 visible friendly **Dire Wolves** units wholly within 18" of this unit to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn:
• Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons (including **Companion** weapons).
• The targets can ignore the effect of the ‘Beast’ ability.

warscrolls.name: Blades of the Hollow King
warscrolls.fluff: Known as the Hollow King, Cado Ezechiar seeks both vengeance and redemption. Once a mortal king, his lands were ravaged by Chaos. Now he hunts the servants of ruin alongside a band of mismatched companions. The vampire Sissendra is a graceful killer who delights in reckless bloodshed, while the death priest Aurelias wields fearsome eldritch power and is accompanied by the twin-headed serpent Kennistrix. Then there is the spirit Solia, bound to one of Ezechiar’s iron rings and sworn to guide her student on his fateful path.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Retribution or Salvation
abilities.lore: Cado’s quest for both vengeance and self-control manifests as two forms of sorcery: bolts of killing judgement and an aura of regal authority that augments nearby undead.
abilities.declare: This unit can cast this spell while its **Cado Ezechiar** is on the battlefield. Pick a visible unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If the target is an enemy unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on it. If the target is a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit, subtract 1 from wound rolls for combat attacks that target that unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Aurelias
abilities.lore: Vizier to Neferata herself, Aurelias is a learned necromancer who lends his arcane expertise to aid Cado in battle – so long as doing so aligns with the Mortarch’s interests as well…
abilities.declare: This unit can use this ability while its **Aurelias** is on the battlefield.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following to apply for the rest of the turn:

• Add 1 to this unit’s power level.
•  Each time a casting roll is made for this unit, you can re-roll 1 of the dice.

abilities.name: Solia, The Tutor
abilities.lore: Teacher and tutor to Cado when he was a mortal prince, the spirit of Solia is now bound to one of his iron rings, offering him guidance on his path.
abilities.declare: This unit can use this ability while its **Cado Ezechiar** is on the battlefield.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following to apply for the rest of the turn:

• This unit has **WARD (5+)**.
• This unit’s **Ezechiarian Greatsword** has **Crit (Mortal)**.

warscrolls.name: Blood Knights
warscrolls.fluff: Resplendent in gleaming armour, vampiric chevaliers charge into battle, crushing their foes beneath the thundering hooves of their skeletal mounts. These are the Blood Knights, the elite warriors of the Soulblight hosts. They claim to follow a code of honour, but in truth, their self-proclaimed chivalry is nothing but a shining veneer that corrodes as soon as the killing starts.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/5), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Riders of Ruin
abilities.lore: Blood Knights trample clean over lesser foes to strike at more worthy challengers.
abilities.effect: When this unit moves, it can pass through models in enemy **INFANTRY** units and can pass through the combat ranges of enemy **INFANTRY** units, but it cannot end a move in combat unless specified in the ability used.

abilities.name: Trampled to Dust
abilities.lore: Infantrymen who find themselves in the Blood Knights’ path are crushed beneath the hooves of their Nightmare steeds.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Bloodseeker Palanquin
warscrolls.fluff: From atop macabre conveyances known as Bloodseeker Palanquins, the Sanguinarchs refine the art of blood-blending. In battle, they violently exsanguinate worthy champions, using their ichor in crimson concoctions to invigorate their vampiric kin.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Wails of the Damned
abilities.lore: Unnerving howls follow this macabre carriage wherever it roams.
abilities.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: A Promising Concoction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Sanguinarchs are obsessed with crafting the finest ichorous blends, and they can further refine such rich pickings to bolster their strength and that of their lackeys.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **VAMPIRE** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Cado Ezechiar, The Hollow King
warscrolls.fluff: Known as the Hollow King, Cado Ezechiar seeks both vengeance and redemption. Once a mortal king, his lands were ravaged by Chaos. Now he hunts the servants of ruin while seeking a way to escape the controlling will of Nagash.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Retribution or Salvation
abilities.lore: Cado’s quest for both vengeance and self-control manifests as two forms of sorcery: bolts of killing judgement and an aura of regal authority that augments nearby undead.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
If the target is an enemy unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on it.

If the target is a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit, subtract 1 from wound rolls for combat attacks that target that unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Court of the Lost
abilities.lore: The iron rings worn by Cado hold the spirits of souls from his past. In times of need, he summons their ethereal forms to aid him.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn.

• This unit has a Move characteristic of 12".
• Add 1 to casting rolls, unbinding rolls and banishment rolls for this unit.
• This unit’s melee weapons have **Crit (Mortal)**.

warscrolls.name: Corpse Cart
warscrolls.fluff: Across those territories ruled by the Midnight Aristocracy travel macabre conveyances, filled to the brim with decomposing flesh and drawn by groaning cadavers. These are the Corpse Carts, unspeakable devices that function as locus points for deathly magic, imbuing nearby undead with terrible vigour and might.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Locus of Undeath
abilities.lore: Corpse Carts are wellsprings of necromantic power that bestow greater vigour upon the resurrected corpses of the freshly slain.
abilities.effect: Melee weapons used by other friendly **DEADWALKERS** units have **Crit (Auto-wound)** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Coven Throne
warscrolls.fluff: Coven Thrones are a symbol of macabre splendour prized by the most egotistical vampires, those who see the dirt and filth of a churning battlefield as beneath them. Drifting forth upon a surging mass of bound spirits, this necro-crafted palanquin allows its occupants to observe and partake in the slaughter whilst reclining in comfort. Sipping from goblets of freshly drained blood, they pour the rest into an unholy font, reading the bubbling liquid within for signs and portents regarding the battle’s outcome.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Tactical Insight
abilities.lore: The vampire and their acolytes employ their divinatory abilities to manipulate and aid their undying servants.
abilities.effect: Friendly **DEATHRATTLE** and **DEADWALKERS** units have **WARD (5+)** while they are wholly within 6" of this unit.

abilities.name: A Promising Concoction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The gory contents of the Coven Throne’s scrying bowl can be consumed by its riders and other vampires nearby, giving them a flush of power.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **VAMPIRE** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Scrying Pool
abilities.lore: Within this pool of shimmering gore, the vampire foresees the shape of the battle to come.
abilities.effect: If a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Redeploy’ command, you can pick another friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit that has not used a command this phase to use the ‘Redeploy’ command immediately after the first has been resolved (this is an exception to Commands, 1.2). No command point is spent the second time that command is used.

warscrolls.name: Cursed Sepulchre
warscrolls.fluff: Across the realms there are many places drenched in the energies of death – sites of necromantic potential where hundreds or even thousands of souls met their tragic end amidst violence and horror. Such areas are rich pickings for the Soulblight Gravelords. They contain bounteous quantities of desiccated flesh and yellowed bone ready to be transformed into undead soldiery or used to patch up damaged warriors. Better still, practitioners of death magic can siphon the grim energies permeating these locations to restore their unnatural vitality.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Leeching Soil
abilities.lore: When blood is spilt upon this unhallowed ground, it is hungrily absorbed by the tainted earth and the withered roots running through it.
abilities.effect: Each time a model (friendly or enemy) is slain while it is within 9" of this terrain feature, **Heal (1)** this terrain feature.

abilities.name: Locus of Shyish
abilities.lore: A palpable aura of death lingers over these ancient burial sites, dormant necromantic energy that can be harnessed by Shyishan practitioners.
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** casts a **SUMMON SPELL** from the ‘Manifestations of the Grave’ lore, you can measure the range and visibility from this terrain feature instead.

warscrolls.name: Deadwalker Zombies
warscrolls.fluff: Shambling and groaning, flesh sagging off yellowed bones, a single zombie is a disconcerting sight. A horde of them can unnerve even the most steadfast warriors. Individually, a zombie is a clumsy and slow adversary, but in bulk they become a significant threat. Bludgeoning aside enemy defences, they lash out with filthy fingernails and crude improvised weapons, heedless of their losses.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Mindless Ferocity
abilities.lore: Heedless of pain and knowing nothing of fear, Deadwalker Zombies are relentless in their efforts to slay the foe, and they will continue to hack, claw and bite even as they meet their final end.
abilities.effect: Each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. On a 6+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Deathrattle Skeletons
warscrolls.fluff: Clattering forwards in formation, their yellowed skulls devoid of expression, the Deathrattle Skeletons go forth to annihilate the living. These undead automatons have no free will and are imbued only with the imperative to slay as swiftly and efficiently as possible. Even if a skeletal warrior is smashed to pieces, the horror continues – with the battlefield steeped in necromantic energies, the Deathrattle Skeleton’s bones will lock together once more as it clambers upright, ready to kill again.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Skeleton Legion
abilities.lore: As necromantic energies blanket the battlefield, long-dead warriors stagger to their feet once more, eye sockets aglow with killing light.
abilities.effect: You can return D3 slain models to this unit.

warscrolls.name: Dire Wolves
warscrolls.fluff: It is said that to hear a Dire Wolf’s howl is to be damned. These lupine undead are tireless hunters, and when they finally run their prey to ground, their powerful jaws ensure that the kill comes swiftly indeed.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Champion (1/10), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: On The Hunt
abilities.lore: Unlike most undead, Dire Wolves have lost almost none of the swiftness they possessed in life and are forever hungry for warm flesh.
abilities.effect: This unit can use a **RUN** ability and still use **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.

warscrolls.name: Fell Bats
warscrolls.fluff: Leather-winged monstrosities bloated on blood and necrotic sorcery, Fell Bats haunt the cursed forests and battlefields of the realms. Each is large enough to pluck a rider from the saddle and carry them off into the skies, and their dagger-length canine teeth are so sharp that they can puncture solid metal.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Fleet and Fell
abilities.lore: Borne swiftly upon huge, tattered wings, Fell Bats are able to swoop down upon and break away from their prey with impunity, their frenzied flapping making it difficult to pin them down.
abilities.effect: This unit can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by **RETREAT** abilities.

warscrolls.name: Gorslav the Gravekeeper
warscrolls.fluff: The macabre creature known as Gorslav the Gravekeeper lorded over the many cemeteries and mausoleums of Ulfenkarn. In battle, he leads hordes of shambling Deadwalkers that hurl themselves at the foe, infused with a rabid determination.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Keeper of the Corpse-gardens
abilities.lore: In battle, Gorslav can call upon his Deadwalker minions to throw themselves into enemy attacks and blunt their blades.
abilities.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly **Deadwalker Zombies** unit:

• This unit has **WARD (4+)**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly **Deadwalker Zombies** unit within this unit’s combat range after the damage sequence for this unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Arise! Arise!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared the ‘Endless Legions’ ability and picked a friendly Deadwalkers unit to be the target
abilities.lore: With a rasping cry, the Gravekeeper beckons his freshly buried victims to rise as undead and defend the walls of Ulfenkarn.
abilities.effect: When resolving the effect of the ‘Endless Legions’ ability, set up the replacement unit wholly within 3" of this unit instead of wholly within 12" and more than 3" from all enemy units instead of more than 9", even if it is not your movement phase. The replacement unit can still use **CHARGE** abilities this turn.

warscrolls.name: Hand of Nagash
warscrolls.fluff: A grasping, skeletal arm spears its way into reality, reaching for living beings and seizing them between its bony fingers. Even those who manage to avoid its deathly cold grasp are not safe, for the Hand of Nagash is not so easily denied. Leaving the frozen and crushed corpses of its victims behind, it will disappear – only to emerge somewhere else to continue its murderous rampage.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Inescapable Reach
abilities.lore: From a yawning rift in the fabric of reality, a colossal arm of eldritch bone emerges.
abilities.declare: This **MANIFESTATION** can only use this ability if it has not been set up this turn.
abilities.effect: Remove this **MANIFESTATION** from the battlefield and set it up anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, roll a D3. On a 2+, this **MANIFESTATION** can move a number of inches equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Chill Grasp
abilities.lore: A deathly chill seizes the hearts of the foe, leaving them petrified with fear.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 4+, the following effects apply until the start of your next turn:

•  While the target is within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION**, the target has a maximum control score of 1 that cannot be modified.
•  While the target is within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION**, the target cannot use **MOVE** abilities.

warscrolls.name: Ivya Volga, The Outcast
warscrolls.fluff: An outcast amongst a dynasty renowned for the strength of its blood ties, the rebellious Ivya Volga has spent centuries roaming across the deadliest wilds of Shyish and beyond, hacking down its most ferocious denizens with her woodcutter’s axe and drinking from their opened veins. She surrounds herself with a swarm of needle-fanged bats, which will sacrifice themselves without hesitation to protect their mistress.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Total Dominance
abilities.lore: With a swift and precise gesture, Ivya exerts her powerful influence over nearby monsters.
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy **MONSTERS** while they are within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Shrieking Swarm
abilities.lore: Wherever Iyva goes, a flight of screeching bats accompanies her.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Behemoth's Bane
abilities.lore: Ivya has spent centuries roaming the forests of Shyish and beyond, and she has triumphed over some of the most heinous beasts imaginable.
abilities.effect: Subtract 2 from the Attacks characteristic of enemy **MONSTERS’** melee weapons while they are in combat with this unit.

warscrolls.name: Kosargi Nightguard
warscrolls.fluff: The Kosargi ogors served Radukar for centuries, first in life and then in death, raised from the grave with foul necrotic sorcery. In battle, they scatter all foes before them, carving great bloody swathes into the enemy with each swing of their bardiches.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: A Pact Maintained
abilities.lore: The undead mercenaries of Kos are as loyal to Radukar in death as they were in life.
abilities.effect: While a friendly **Radukar the Wolf** or **Radukar the Beast** is within this unit’s combat range, both that unit and this unit have **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Kritza, the Rat Prince
warscrolls.fluff: The repellent Kritza is a vampire that has feasted upon so many rodents that he has adopted many of the traits of these hardy and cunning creatures. Hiding his sewer stench behind a thick cloud of equally nauseating perfume, this gaunt and unsettling creature preys upon mortals without restraint. Whenever he feels outmatched, he will simply transform into a swarm of vermin and slip away through cracks in the walls.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Scurrying Retreat
abilities.lore: Just when a foe has him cornered, Kritza transfigures into a swarm of scurrying rats, only to rematerialise elsewhere and drive his blade into an enemy’s back.
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

abilities.name: The Verminous Court
abilities.lore: Kritza believes himself an appreciator of the finer things in undeath, and his rodent servants are adept in snatching away trinkets and treasures for his collection.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target, then pick an artefact of power that the target has.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target no longer has that artefact of power.

warscrolls.name: Lady Annika, the Thirsting Blade
warscrolls.fluff: Annika fights as though suffused by some arcane swiftness, for she is faster and more agile than any of her Vyrkos kin. She wields the Blade Proboscian, slicing open the veins of her prey and letting the enchanted weapon drain their blood dry in moments. Yet for every foe exsanguinated in this manner, Annika gains only fleeting succour. Whether caused by her consumption of exotic substances or simply a side-effect of the Soulblight curse, her unique, haemovoric mania can never be satisfied.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (4+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Starving Nightmare
abilities.lore: Unable to contain her hunger any longer, Lady Annika springs forth from hiding, eager to glut herself on the blood of the foe.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **lying in wait**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit wholly within enemy territory and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Kiss of the Blade Proboscian
abilities.lore: This pitted and corroded blade should not endure – and yet, it does. The same cannot be said for anything scratched by its mouldering point.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was allocated any damage points inflicted by this unit’s combat attacks this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Supernatural Speed
abilities.lore: Lady Annika’s near-permanent state of starvation drives her ahead of the main battlelines, ready to pounce as soon as prey draws near.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **lying in wait**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Lauka Vai, Mother of Nightmares
warscrolls.fluff: Not for nothing is Lauka Vai known as the Mother of Nightmares, for she is the matron of the bestial and maligned Avengorii dynasty. Though she refuses to give in to the vile urges that thunder in her cursed blood, Vai is swift to respond to threats or insults with overwhelming violence. Foes are ripped to shreds by her talons and her dancing rapier, their gory remains tossed to the menagerie of twisted horrors that serves as her court.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Nightmare's Miasma
abilities.lore: The strange curse of the Vengorians sees shining blades and hallowed relics crumble and patinate in their presence.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: The Queen's Dictat
abilities.lore: Lauka summons an arcane blood-mist that drives a beast among her brood into a terrible frenzy.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly non-**UNIQUE SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS MONSTER** wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Pick 1 of the target’s melee weapons. If the target has any **Companion** melee weapons, you must pick 1 of those. Add D3 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Impaling Talons
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Lauka Vai thrusts her massive talons into her prey with lethal precision, inflicting horrendous wounds upon them.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is equal to or less than the target’s Health characteristic, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Mannfred von Carstein, Mortarch of Night
warscrolls.fluff: A cunning military mastermind and a skilled wielder of the darkest magic, Mannfred von Carstein is feared and reviled across the Mortal Realms. In his wake lie the corpses of untold thousands, slaughtered because they stood in the path of his vaulting ambition. The Mortarch of Night rides into battle atop the dread abyssal Ashigaroth, carving a bloody path through his terrified prey with lightning slashes of Gheistvor, the Sword of Unholy Power. Any foes able to fend off this deadly assault are subjected to a soul-withering storm of amethyst sorcery that seals their demise.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

melee.name: Gheistvor, the Sword of Unholy Power

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Ashigaroth’s Claws** is 3.

abilities.name: The Mortarch of Night
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for a SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS unit wholly within 12" of this unit
abilities.lore: Mannfred’s ancient cunning is rightly feared throughout the Mortal Realms.
abilities.effect: The unit using the ‘Redeploy’ command can move into combat when using that ability.

abilities.name: Wind of Death
abilities.lore: Mannfred conjures a howling gust of spectral wind that tears the souls from the bodies of those who feel its chilling bite.
abilities.declare: Pick a point on the battlefield within 18" of the caster, pick up to 3 enemy units within 6" of that point and visible to the caster to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Ashigaroth's Hunger
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Mannfred’s dread abyssal is afflicted by a hunger as indiscriminate as it is unending, and it strikes with lightning-fast speed to attempt in vain to satiate that hunger.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit has **STRIKE‑FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Sword of Unholy Power
abilities.lore: Gheistvor drinks deep of its victims’ souls, bolstering the power of Mannfred’s risen minions.
abilities.effect: If this unit has slain any enemy models this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **DEATHRATTLE** and **DEADWALKERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Mortis Engine
warscrolls.fluff: When a truly formidable Necromancer is destroyed, their acolytes will reverently collect their remains and inter them within rune-marked caskets and reliquaries. These are then mounted atop the arcane constructs known as Mortis Engines, each guided into battle by a Corpsemaster learned in the ways of the amethyst arts. This dreadful reliquary acts as a wellspring of necromantic power, sending forth waves of life-stealing magic and bolstering the Shyishan energies that animate lesser undead.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Wave of Power
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.lore: With arms held aloft, the Corpsemaster discharges the energy stored within the Mortis Engine, searing the life force from those nearby.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 10" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the value of this unit’s **stored energy dice**. Then, change the value of the **stored energy dice** back to 1.

abilities.name: Nexus of Death Energy
abilities.lore: Mortis Engines are constructed around the remains of a slain Necromancer, who acts as a locus for the magics of the underworlds.
abilities.effect: When a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit is picked to be the target of the ‘Deathly Invocation’ ability, add D3 to the number of damage points that can be healed or the combined Health characteristic of models that can be returned.

abilities.name: The Reliquary
abilities.lore: When the amethyst magics that thrum through a Mortis Engine reach a crescendo, its Corpsemaster custodian can unleash them as a lethal bow wave of power.
abilities.effect: When this unit is set up for the first time, place a **stored energy dice** beside it with the ‘1’ facing up. Each time a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** successfully casts a spell while it is within 12" of this unit, increase the value of the **stored energy dice** beside this unit by 1 (to a maximum of 6).

warscrolls.name: Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead
warscrolls.fluff: All living beings dread the name of Nagash, the God of Undeath. Cruel and tyrannical, the overlord of Shyish intends to conquer the Mortal Realms and transform them into a lifeless Necrotopia, in which not a speck of dust moves unless it is by his will.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (9), Fly, Ward (5+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, subtract 3 from its power level.

abilities.name: Hand of Dust
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Nagash’s touch can turn a foe to a pile of dusty bones in moments.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **HERO** or **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Hide a dice in one of your hands or under one of two appropriate containers. Your opponent must pick one of your hands or containers. If they pick the one hiding the dice, this ability has no effect. If they pick the empty one, the target is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Supreme Lord of the Undead
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO** non-**UNIQUE DEATH** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit identical to the target wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Invocation of Nagash
abilities.lore: In a storm of morbid sorcery, Nagash blasts his foes’ souls or re-knits his minions’ bodies.
abilities.declare: This unit can cast this spell more than once per phase. Pick a visible unit wholly within 18" of this unit that has not been picked to be the target of this spell this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
If the target is an enemy unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on it. If the target is a friendly **DEATH** unit, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Return a number of slain models to the target unit with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3.
• The target has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: The Staff of Power
abilities.lore: Alakanash is capped with gems of purest grave-sand.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to casting rolls for this unit while it has not miscast any spells this turn. If this unit miscasts a spell, ignore the restriction that would stop this unit from casting any more spells this turn.

warscrolls.name: Necromancer
warscrolls.fluff: At first glance, one might number a Necromancer amongst the dead. Their faces are sallow and their limbs wizened, but a vestige of life still glints in their eyes – though it is all but smothered by morbid arcana. Even as they are corrupted by these energies, a Necromancer wields them to bolster the legions of Nagash and place enervating curses on the foe, sapping them of vitality with the hunger of the Shyish Nadir.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Undead Minions
abilities.lore: Necromancers are obsessed with staving off death and will sacrifice any number of their resurrected servants to protect themselves.
abilities.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit:

• This unit has **WARD (4+)**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit within this unit’s combat range after the damage sequence for this unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Vanhel's Danse Macabre
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The undead are filled with magical energy that causes them to jerk forwards and attack with tireless, unnatural speed.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** or **DEADWALKERS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. After the first is used, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Neferata, Mortarch of Blood
warscrolls.fluff: Ancient beyond mortal comprehension, Queen Neferata is the progenitor of the Soulblight dynasties. Though she is a being who adores luxury and the intricate schemes of her royal court, Neferata has overseen more war and bloodshed than any of her rivals. Borne into battle atop the dread abyssal Nagadron, she traps her foes in a deadly web of mists and sorcery. As they stagger in confusion, she artfully dispatches them with the dagger Akmet-har and the staff Aken-seth – ritual weapons from another age, imbued with terrible enchantments.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Nagadron’s Claws** is 3.

abilities.name: Dark Mist
abilities.lore: Neferata summons tendrils of penumbral mist to coil around her minions, rendering their corporeal forms as insubstantial as smoke.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly non‑**MONSTER SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for the target (positive and negative) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Twilight's Allure
abilities.lore: Neferata cloaks her minions in perpetual gloom.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** units while they are wholly within 6" of this unit.

abilities.name: The Mortarch of Blood
abilities.lore: Neferata has millennia of experience analysing and unpicking her foes’ ploys.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **DEATHRATTLE INFANTRY** or **DEADWALKERS INFANTRY** units to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Each target can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: The Adevore
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Should Nagadron sense the impending doom of a foe wounded by the Dagger of Jet, it will fall upon them and hungrily feast on their soul.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** that was allocated any damage points inflicted by this unit’s **Akmet-har** this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, the target is automatically destroyed.

warscrolls.name: Prince Vhordrai
warscrolls.fluff: The most feared vampire cavalier in existence is the legendary Prince Vhordrai, castellan – and prisoner – of the Crimson Keep. When released from his cursed fortress to wage war against the living, Vhordrai rides forth atop the undead Draconith known as Shordemaire. This ancient beast spews gouts of pestilential breath that melt flesh and armour, before swooping in low so that its master can drive his Bloodlance through the ribs of any foes still standing.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Shordemaire’s Claws** is 5.

abilities.name: Quickblood
abilities.lore: Vhordrai calls upon the power of the curse running through his veins to strike with impossible speed.
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Trail of Crimson
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Shordemaire ploughs into the enemy’s lines, its giant jaws tearing huge chunks from monsters or swallowing smaller foes whole.
abilities.declare: This unit can make a pile-in move (even if it is not in combat). Then, if this unit is in combat, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Saint of Slaughter
abilities.lore: Under the fierce scrutiny of Prince Vhordrai, vampires revel in displaying their martial skill.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**MONSTER VAMPIRE** unit that destroyed a unit this turn using a **FIGHT** ability and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the battle:

• Add 2" to the target’s Move characteristic.
• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.
• Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

More than 1 effect can apply to a unit at the same time; however, each effect can only be applied to a unit once.

warscrolls.name: Radukar the Beast
warscrolls.fluff: The vampire Radukar became ever more monstrous as the full power of his curse manifested. He transformed into a terrifying berserker-beast, the injuries that threatened to end him eclipsed by raw strength. This altered Radukar is a towering creature with dagger-length claws, capable of moving with a swiftness that seems impossible for his size.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Armour of the Night
abilities.lore: With a mere thought, Radukar the Beast summons wisps of pure darkness to form a penumbral shield around his body, protecting him from harm.
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks that target this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Beast Will Out
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: In his hulking bestial form, Radukar is a frenzied abomination concerned only with tearing apart everything in his path.
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, it can move D6". It can move into combat.

abilities.name: Call to the Hunt
abilities.lore: With an exultant howl, Radukar leads the charge, his surge of bloodlust filling nearby undead minions with unholy impetus.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **DEATHRATTLE** and **DEADWALKERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Radukar the Wolf
warscrolls.fluff: Broad-shouldered and swollen with the animalistic powers of the Vyrkos bloodline, Radukar the Wolf overwhelms his prey with sheer ferocity, swinging a blade seized from the tomb of the vampiric emperor Morkan. Not for him the role of martial strategist positioned behind a mass of rotting footsoldiers: Radukar delights in the rush and crunch of battle, ripping and tearing at the enemy in a wild frenzy, laughing with the pure thrill of slaughter.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Master of the Pack
abilities.lore: His voice redolent with supernatural power, Radukar the Wolf barks the command to charge and his undead minions hurl themselves at the enemy.
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, you can re-roll charge rolls for friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Call to the Hunt
abilities.lore: With an exultant howl, Radukar leads the charge, his surge of bloodlust filling nearby undead minions with unholy impetus.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **DEATHRATTLE** and **DEADWALKERS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Revenant Draconith
warscrolls.fluff: Creatures both tragic and horrifying, the Revenant Draconith are titans from another age, raised from death by the foulest necromantic rituals. They still possess the strength of Dracothion’s true spawn, but all nobility has been scoured from them. They now exist only to kill, and at this there are few beings in existence more proficient. Descending from the skies like the image of death itself, they fall upon their prey spewing gouts of flesh-melting gas and shredding mortal flesh with claws and teeth.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Draconic Claws** is 5.

abilities.name: Loathsome Descent
abilities.lore: The Revenant Draconith plunges into battle with a roar, slamming into its prey with bone-shattering force.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **high above the battlefield**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Red Ruin
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Tearing free of the press with talons and teeth, the Revenant Draconith leaves a trail of gory destruction behind as it takes to the skies once more, searching for fresh prey.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+, resolve the following effects:
•  Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
•  **Heal (X)** this unit where **X** is an amount equal to the roll.
•  This unit can be removed from the battlefield and set up in reserve **high above the battlefield**.

abilities.name: Death on Tattered Wings
abilities.lore: The Revenant Draconith circles above the arrayed armies, eye sockets aglow with unholy energy.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **high above the battlefield**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Sanguine Swarm
warscrolls.fluff: Sanguine Swarms appear as twin clusters of red-eyed chiropterans, their leathery wings flapping as they descend upon their prey. In truth, these are not beasts but arcane conjurations, though that does not make their leeching bites any less deadly. The spell feeds upon the blood of those it assails, growing ever more potent and increasingly difficult to dispel.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Leeching Bites
abilities.lore: Although arcane in nature, these magical creatures still feed on the blood of the living.
abilities.effect: Each time an attack made by this **MANIFESTATION** scores a critical hit, **Heal (1)** this **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect:
When a number of damage points equal to this **MANIFESTATION**’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this **MANIFESTATION** is destroyed and both its parts are removed from play.

Each time this **MANIFESTATION** moves, both its parts must end within 9" of each other.

Each part of this **MANIFESTATION** is armed with **Leeching Bites**.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Corpse Cart
warscrolls.fluff: Trundling wagons piled with corpses dredged up from the Ghyranite swamps, Corpse Carts act as lodestones for deathly magic. They are driven by Corpsemasters skilled in the arts of necromancy, gaunt figures whose cursed goads drive the risen dead onwards with uncanny focus, driving them into the enemy in a mass of rotten, grasping limbs.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Necromantic Goad
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Corpsemasters are experts at directing the mindless efforts of the recently deceased.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Deadwalker Zombies** unit that is wholly within 12" of this unit and not in combat to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target can move up to 3". It can move into combat.

abilities.name: Unholy Lodestone
abilities.lore: Deadwalker Zombies that are driven into battle like loathsome cattle are invigorated by the presence of nearby Corpse Carts.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Deadwalker Zombies** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, while the target is wholly within 12" of this unit, its ‘Mindless Ferocity’ ability inflicts mortal damage on rolls of 5+ instead of 6+.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Sekhar, Fang of Nulahmia
warscrolls.fluff: The ruthless vampire Sekhar is one of Mortarch Neferata’s most formidable agents. Dispatched to the endless green of Ghyran on a mission to advance the cause of Nulahmia, she seeks to dominate her foes through sheer, hypnotic force of will. Those who defy her are spitted on the end of her glaive or fed to the coiling god-serpent Ouboroth.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Irresistible Demand
abilities.lore: Sekhar locks eyes across the battlefield with her victim, who falls hopelessly under her control, lashing out wildly even as their allies struggle to hold them down.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **HERO** within 18" of this unit to be the target. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on each other enemy unit within 3" of the target.

abilities.name: Allow Me to Remind You...
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit
abilities.lore: As Neferata’s premier agent in the Mortal Realms, Sekhar’s authority and near matchless powers of hypnotism ensure few have the willpower to resist her demands.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 5+, that command has no effect, it still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use it are still lost.

abilities.name: Lest You Forget...
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round, Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL or CHARGE ability for a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit
abilities.lore: Sekhar’s presence is a tangible reminder of hidden obligations to the vampiric nation of Nulahmia, causing foes to deliberately foul their own forces’ efforts so that their clandestine allegiances remain undiscovered.
abilities.effect: Pick 1 dice from the charge roll or casting roll for that ability. Your opponent must re-roll that dice.

warscrolls.name: Sekhar, Fang of Nulahmia
warscrolls.fluff: Sekhar is one of the most lethally skilled agents of the Mortarch Neferata and the most prominent member of the elite order known as the Fangs of Nulahmia. She is a master manipulator and spy whose honeyed whispers have seen more kingdoms crumble to dust than she can recall. Sekhar travels the realms at the behest of her mistress, advancing the cause of the Nulahmian elite and ensuring – through subterfuge, trickery or outright slaughter – that Neferata’s enemies are bled white.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Serpentine Agility
abilities.lore: Sekhar moves as a blinding blur, her unnatural speed obscuring her form from even the keenest gaze.
abilities.effect: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack that targets this unit is 1-4, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.

abilities.name: The Time-Swallower's Maw
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Though Sekhar is loath to let Ouboroth feast upon souls, sometimes, needs must.
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: This unit cannot use the ‘Serpentine Agility’ ability for the rest of the battle. Roll 2D6 for each target. If the roll exceeds the target’s Move characteristic, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the difference between the roll and its Move characteristic.

abilities.name: Death's Construction
abilities.lore: Through the subtlest arcane suggestion, Sekhar implants her will in vulnerable minds – supplanting their former purpose with the undying will of Nulahmia.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, while they are wholly within 6" of this unit, friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** units cannot be picked to be the target of abilities used by the target other than **FIGHT** abilities.

warscrolls.name: Terrorgheist
warscrolls.fluff: The Terrorgheist is a bloodthirsty undead beast whose piercing cry scythes through the enemy as it plunges into the fray. Survivors are left reeling and defenceless against the eternally starving beast as it attempts to devour them, and such is the size of its maw that human-sized prey is often swallowed whole.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Skeletal Talons** is 4.

abilities.name: Sonic Assault
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: With a barrage of ear-piercing shrieks, the Terrorgheist drops from the sky to savage its stunned prey.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice for each model in the target unit.

If 3 or more of the dice have the same value, for the rest of the turn, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST**.

If 6 or more of the dice have the same value, for the rest of the turn, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** and the target cannot use commands.

abilities.name: Gaping Maw
abilities.lore: This horrific creature bites a great chunk out of its prey – or even swallows it whole.
abilities.effect: Each time an attack made with this unit’s **Fanged Maw** scores a critical hit, that attack inflicts 6 mortal damage on the target unit and the attack sequence ends.

warscrolls.name: The Crimson Court
warscrolls.fluff: Prince Duvalle claims descent from the Von Carstein lineage, and few are foolish enough to gainsay him to his face. He is adept at conjuring magical glamours and illusions, rendering his prey disoriented and vulnerable before striking. Duvalle’s Crimson Court are a clique of vampires obsessed with the hunt. Having slaked their thirsts the realms over, they now set their sights on the living mountain of Beastgrave and the warriors who battle within.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Wizard (1), Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Come Then, Amuse Us
abilities.lore: Prince Duvalle and his courtiers scour every corner of the Mortal Realms in the hopes of finding worthy opponents. Alas, few measure up to the vampires’ lofty standards.
abilities.effect:
If this unit is in combat with any enemy **HEROES**, roll a D3 and then pick a number of effects from the list below equal to the roll:

• Add 1 to save rolls for this unit for the rest of the turn.
• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.
• Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: The Exiled Dead
warscrolls.fluff: The vampire Deintalos dwells in the darkness of Harrowdeep, snaring those who walk its labyrinthine passages. His experiments with the Force Dynamic – the arco-electric force he believes animates all things – led to his self-imposed exile from Shyish, where his brand of necromancy is taboo. In Harrowdeep, Deintalos found an ideal place to hide his grisly experiments. Aided by his mortal apprentice in necromancy, Marcov, Deintalos animates cadavers with arcane machinery and using the Force Dynamic. These Arcwalkers, as Deintalos dubs them, act in eerie unison as they tear apart their foes.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Unfeeling Fortitude
abilities.lore: Many have found, to their cost, that injuries that would instantly kill another opponent do not even slow the Arcwalkers.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Deintalos the Exile
abilities.lore: Deintalos does not take his exile lightly and hopes one day to develop his art to rival that of the Great Necromancer himself.
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Deintalos the Exile** is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**. While this unit’s **Prentice Marcov** is on the battlefield, add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

warscrolls.name: The Sepulchral Guard
warscrolls.fluff: The Sepulchral Guard haunt the Mirrored City of Shadespire, cursed by Nagash to fully appreciate their horror. Led by the Sepulchral Warden, the former Lord-Marshal of the city, they fall upon and slay interlopers with an unsettling swiftness.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Restless Dead
abilities.lore: Nagash denies the gift of eternal rest to those who defied his will.
abilities.effect: You can return D3 slain models to this unit.

warscrolls.name: The Sons of Velmorn
warscrolls.fluff: When the Ghurish city of Sentarion was swallowed by the Gnarlwood, King Velmorn sought to defeat the monstrous trees using the Tyrant’s Crown. Yet the sorcerous relic cursed him to a hateful unlife, though his will remains formidable. When Velmorn placed the Tyrant’s Crown upon his head, his loyal sons were slain by a surge of death magic and resurrected as wights. Filled with bitterness, they are nevertheless bound to serve their father for all eternity.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Rise Again
abilities.lore: The Tyrant’s Crown fulfilled Morlak’s desire for an eternal lineage – though not in the form he imagined.
abilities.effect: If this unit’s **King Morlak Velmorn** is on the battlefield, roll a dice for each slain model from this unit. On a 4+, you can return 1 slain model to this unit.

warscrolls.name: Torgillius the Chamberlain
warscrolls.fluff: This dark magician earned himself a place in Radukar’s court thanks to his mastery of grave-sand and its uses. When called into battle, Torgillius can unleash devastating sorcery that leaves any survivors drained of all strength.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Failing Fortitude
abilities.lore: Ruthlessly targeting his prey’s weaknesses, Torgillius hurls bolts of enervating energy to drain their strength and resilience.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s attacks.

abilities.name: Trusted Lieutenant
abilities.lore: Radukar has granted Torgillius the resources with which to continue his research. In return, the Chamberlain offers his necromantic expertise and the secrets gathered for him by his vermin spies.
abilities.effect: This unit can use the ‘Deathly Invocation’ ability even if a different friendly unit has already used it this turn, but units that have already been picked to be targets of that ability this turn cannot be picked to be targets.

warscrolls.name: Unholy Reliquary
warscrolls.fluff: The corpse of an elder vampire lies within this cursed casket, still smouldering with hatred and hunger. These remains act as a conduit of potent necromantic energies. Soulblight lords often take such a relic into battle with them, drawing upon its profane power in order to heal their wounds or to infuse their undead soldiers with a sudden burst of killing might.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords

abilities.name: Draw on Power
abilities.lore: The necromantic energy of this long-perished vampire can be siphoned by their kind for sustenance or drawn upon to grant a temporary rush of power.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS HERO** wholly within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following:

• **Heal (D3)** the target.
• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn and banish this **MANIFESTATION**.

warscrolls.name: Vampire Lord
warscrolls.fluff: The eldest vampires are granted fearsome powers by the Soulblight curse: unnatural speed, potent arcane power, and strength enough to dismember foes with their bare hands. Peerless duellists and cunning strategists all, they affect an aura of nobility even as their innermost impulses urge them to glut themselves on warm, fresh blood. They sate this hunger in the thick of battle, slicing throats with ornate rapiers or smashing open ribcages with flanged maces to devour the crimson rain that sprays forth.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Sanguine Blur
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: By the time this vampire’s prey notices the crimson streak heading towards them, it is far too late.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy non-**HERO** units and more than 3" from all enemy **HEROES**.

warscrolls.name: Vampire Lord on Nightmare Steed
warscrolls.fluff: When mounted upon an undead steed known as a nightmare, a Vampire Lord carves a gory path through the enemy with each thundering charge. The beast’s ironshod hooves cave in chests and grind foes into the mud, while the undead cavalier astride it lays about themself with a blade or axe, opening throats with every blow.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Cavalry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: 'For Glory! For Blood!'
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a CHARGE ability for this unit
abilities.lore: The Vampire Lord and their retinue of favoured knights charge into the fray, driving deep into the enemy lines.
abilities.effect: You can re-roll the charge roll for that **CHARGE** ability. Then, before the charge move is made, you can pick a friendly **Blood Knights** unit that is not in combat, is wholly within 12" of this unit and has not used a **CHARGE** ability this turn to be the target. If this unit charges, then, immediately after the **CHARGE** ability used by this unit has been resolved, the target can immediately use the ‘Charge’ ability even if it is not your charge phase. In addition, you can re-roll charge rolls for the target this phase.

abilities.name: Strike At The Heart
abilities.lore: Focusing upon their own cursed hunger, the Vampire Lord stokes the predatory urges of a formation of Blood Knights, whose lances and blades strike with great precision and force as they impact with the foe.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Blood Knights** unit that charged this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that unit’s **Templar Weapons** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Vampire Lord on Zombie Dragon
warscrolls.fluff: The proudest and most martial of vampires take to battle astride terrifying undead drakes. Armed with such a potent mount, they are capable of turning the tide of battle alone, striking down their rivals and supping their blood from enchanted goblets.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Draconic Claws** is 5.

abilities.name: That Which Should Not Be
abilities.lore: To behold such a majestic beast as a dragon in the grip of undeath evokes awe and abject terror in equal measure.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Bloodthirsty Dominance
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: The Vampire Lord and its monstrous mount single out worthy prey, tearing into them with relentless fury.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the target’s Health characteristic. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Vargheists
warscrolls.fluff: A vampire becomes a Vargheist when they are deprived of the chance to feed, often as a punishment for transgressing against their own kind. They retain an instinctive deference towards the elders of their bloodline, but in battle, they become uncontrollable as soon as the scent of hot gore is in the air. They plummet from on high with bone-breaking force, smashing their prey to the ground and ripping them open with fangs and claws.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Death's Descent
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: Vargheists swoop down upon their victims from the sky, suddenly overwhelming them in a flurry of claws and fangs.
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Vargskyr
warscrolls.fluff: Unable to control the feral aspect of the curse that surges through their blood, Vargskyr are towering, distended creatures. On the hunt, they stalk their prey before descending upon them in a frenzy of slashing claws and razor-sharp fangs.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Bounding Haste
abilities.lore: Three times the height of a man and with supernatural strength and reflexes, a Vargskyr covers ground with terrifying speed.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3. In addition, when this unit uses a **CHARGE** ability, it can pass through terrain features and enemy models as if it had **FLY**.

warscrolls.name: Vengorian Lord
warscrolls.fluff: Twisted by the power of unbound arcana, Vengorian Lords embody the nightmarish true nature of the Soulblight vampires. Unable to bear the sight of their own reflection, they wield magics of rust and corrosion, revelling in their own self-loathing. Those who rouse a Vengorian’s dark appetite are torn to pieces in a frenzied fit of hunger, their blood gulped down and their bones left crushed and scattered across the ground.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Festering Feast
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Vengorians bid their monstrous broods indulge in gory feasts even as battle rages.
abilities.effect: If any damage points were allocated to enemy units by this unit’s attacks this turn, **Heal (D3)** this unit and each other friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS MONSTER** unit wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Nightmare's Miasma
abilities.lore: The strange curse of the Vengorians sees shining blades and hallowed relics crumble and patinate in their presence.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Scything Talons
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: As the Vengorian Lord crashes into the foe, it lays about itself with frenzied sweeps of its huge talons, cutting down droves of lesser foes.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Vyrkos Blood-born
warscrolls.fluff: In the gloom-shrouded streets of Ulfenkarn, the Vyrkos Blood-born are never far away, stalking the shadows in search of prey. Once these vampiric ends catch the scent of blood, they attack with savage ferocity and lightning speed.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Vampire

abilities.name: Cling to the Shadows
abilities.lore: With quicksilver speed, these creatures scale terrain in a matter of moments, hiding in the shadows while they prepare to strike.
abilities.effect: While each model in this unit is within 1" of any terrain features, this unit cannot be targeted by shooting attacks unless the attacking model is within 9" of it.

abilities.name: Shadowfast
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Enemy Turn
abilities.lore: Vyrkos Blood-born move with savage swiftness.
abilities.effect: This unit can use a **MOVE** ability as if it were your movement phase.

warscrolls.name: Watch Captain Halgrim
warscrolls.fluff: During the purge of the city, the traitorous Watch Captain Oleksandr Halgrim was swift to swear himself and his warriors to the Wolf’s cause. In death, he commanded the vast legions of skeleton warriors known as the Ulfenwatch.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Disciplined Advance
abilities.lore: Under Halgrim’s command, his warriors advance ceaselessly in regimented lockstep to crush the foes of Ulfenkarn.
abilities.effect: Each time you make a run roll for a friendly **Deathrattle Skeletons** unit wholly within 12" of this unit, you can change that roll to a 4.

abilities.name: Echoes of the Watch
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Beneath the sightless gaze of Halgrim, the long-dead garrison of Mournhold act with a disturbing semblance of the martial training they prided themselves on in life.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Deathrattle Skeletons** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Wight King
warscrolls.fluff: Wight Kings are deathless tyrants, ruling over barrow empires populated entirely by skeletal thralls. They exist only to dominate others, having long ago sacrificed emotion and passion on the altar of their obsessive lust for triumph. In battle, few can withstand their relentless assault. Those foolish enough to challenge their supremacy are soon hacked to pieces by the monarch’s cursed blade, a weapon capable of snuffing out a soul with a single scratch.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: King of Shambling Bones
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: In the presence of their sovereign, the footsoldiers of the Deathrattle kingdoms assume a sliver of their former warlike vigour.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **DEATHRATTLE** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target’s melee weapons have **Crit (2 Hits)** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Ancient Strategies
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Death does not rob a Wight King of their strategic genius, and they direct their undead thralls with great skill.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO DEATHRATTLE INFANTRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Wight King on Skeletal Steed
warscrolls.fluff: Most powerful of all the Deathrattle tyrants are the Wight Kings, those undead sovereigns whose domains encompass dozens – sometimes hundreds – of barrow kingdoms. The embodiment of endless conquest, they possess the willpower to defy all save Nagash and the military might to bring entire continents into their iron grasp.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Immortal Conqueror
abilities.lore: A mighty general in life, in undeath, the endless need to wage war and conquer the lands of the living lingers on in this ancient wight as a thirst that can never be quenched.
abilities.declare: Pick an objective or terrain feature within enemy territory.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly **DEATHRATTLE** units while they are wholly within 6" of that objective or terrain feature.

abilities.name: Ancient Barrow Curse
abilities.lore: The weapons of the most powerful Wight Kings leave a scar on the soul that causes the victim to slowly crumble to dust.
abilities.effect:
If an attack made with this unit’s **King’s Relic Weapon** scores a critical hit, the target unit becomes **cursed** for the rest of the battle. Subtract 1 from save rolls for **cursed** units even if this unit has been destroyed.

**Designer’s Note**: *Multiple enemy units can become cursed by this ability but the same enemy unit cannot become cursed more than once.*

warscrolls.name: Wight Lord on Skeletal Steed
warscrolls.fluff: Wight Lords often ride to war atop fleshless steeds, taking command of the household cavalry and overseeing the annihilation of their liege’s foes first-hand. These undead champions observe the battle with passionless focus, waiting for the moment that an opening presents itself. Then they ride forth to exploit that weakness, plunging deep into the enemy’s line at the tip of an armoured wedge.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deathrattle

abilities.name: Lord of Trampling Bones
abilities.lore: The knights who ride alongside a Wight Lord will be the most trusted and skilful of all their housecarls.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **DEATHRATTLE CAVALRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Royal Companions
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Mounted Wight Lords fight accompanied by their most skilled cavaliers, tearing through enemy battlelines.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO DEATHRATTLE CAVALRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Zondara's Gravebreakers
warscrolls.fluff: Once a wise Ghurish wizard, Zondara Rivenheart delved into necromantic lore in an attempt to save her beloved Ferlain from a bestial curse. She now blends beast-magic with the energies of death, ransacking crypts, keeps and dungeons in search of a cure. Zondara’s shambling gravediggers are imbued with Ghurish magic, granting them a strength and ferocity beyond that of most animated corpses. They are led by the cursed beast Ferlain, Rivenheart’s illfated former lover, reduced to a frenzied brute who messily dismembers those who threaten his mistress.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Soulblight Gravelords, Deadwalkers

abilities.name: Wrest From the Realms
abilities.lore: Zondara will tear what she needs from the bones of the realms itself, if necessary.
abilities.effect:
